titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow handicapped individuals a deduction for certain transportation expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow handicapped individuals an income tax deduction for expenses incurred in commuting between their residence and their principal place of employment, including any amounts required for personal assistance.
